content: Trustworthy ML @ NOVA - Claudia Soares Home Claudia SoaresI use optimization, physics, and probability theory to develop robust, interpretable, and trustworthy learning methods to be applied in the real world. Follow Lisbon, Portugal Email Twitter Github Google Scholar ORCIDI am a researcher at NOVA LINCS and an Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science of the NOVA School of Science and Technology. My work is broadly on trustworthy ML for critical Systems, like healthcare and physical systems (swarms of artificial agents, underwater unmanned vehicles, and satellites).My Erdös number is 4.
